author: dreid
msg: This catches up with the latest changes to the FOAf files to correct their
non-RDF validity. Now the files are valid RDF we have slightly tighter checking
of a few areas. This change may result in some data disappearing!
Add ability for people to specify the hex ID of their key when creating a
foaf file and correct some small errors in the foaf file generation. The created
Add a small stylesheet that goes through and corrects the FOAF files for the
basic issues we had previously. NB it doesn't respect any character encoding so
this needs to be adjusted manually after running.

msg: Backing out conditional links -- they won't work properly with cache. Need to find another approach, perhaps AJAX?
